sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO ,TRACK.FNCT_LC_DTLS ,TOWER.EQP_NO ,TOWER.EQP_NM ,replace(replace(TOWER.EQP_NM, trim(TRACK.FNCT_LC_DTLS),''),' 철탑','') as EQP_NM_STRING ,To_Number(replace(replace(TOWER.EQP_NM , trim(TRACK.FNCT_LC_DTLS), ''), '호 철탑','')) as EQP_NM_NUM ,TOWER.LATITUDE ,TOWER.LONGITUDE ,TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD ,TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD ,(SELECT DISTINCT BIZ.FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM M_BIZPLC_T BIZ WHERE BIZ.FST_BIZPLC_CD = TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD AND BIZ.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD) AS FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM ,(SELECT DISTINCT BIZ.SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM M_BIZPLC_T BIZ WHERE BIZ.FST_BIZPLC_CD = TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD AND BIZ.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD) AS SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T TRACK INNER JOIN OP_EQP_HEADER_T TOWER ON TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = TOWER.FNCT_LC_NO AND TOWER.EQP_TY_CD = 'T001' WHERE 1=1
TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#searchCnd1#)
TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#searchCnd2#)
TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = trim(#searchCnd3#)
TOWER.EQP_NM LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%'
) ORDER BY EQP_NM_NUM ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T TRACK INNER JOIN OP_EQP_HEADER_T TOWER ON TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = TOWER.FNCT_LC_NO AND TOWER.EQP_TY_CD = 'T001' WHERE 1=1
TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#searchCnd1#)
TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#searchCnd2#)
TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = trim(#searchCnd3#)
TOWER.EQP_NM LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%'
SELECT DISTINCT FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM AS CODE_NAME, FST_BIZPLC_CD AS CODE_VALUE FROM M_BIZPLC_T WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM
SELECT DISTINCT SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM AS CODE_NAME, SCD_BIZPLC_CD AS CODE_VALUE FROM M_BIZPLC_T WHERE 1=1 AND FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#fst_bizplc_cd#) ORDER BY SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM
SELECT FNCT_LC_NO AS VALUE, FNCT_LC_DTLS AS NAME FROM OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T WHERE FNCT_LC_TY = 'FL05' AND FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#fst_bizplc_cd#) AND SCD_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#scd_bizplc_cd#)

SELECT eqp.eqp_no , eqp.eqp_nm , eqp.fst_bizplc_cd , eqp.scd_bizplc_cd , eqp.fnct_lc_no , tracks.fnct_lc_dtls FROM OP_EQP_HEADER_T eqp INNER JOIN OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T tracks ON eqp.fnct_lc_no = tracks.fnct_lc_no WHERE eqp_no = #eqp_no#
SELECT DISTINCT SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM AS CODE_NAME, SCD_BIZPLC_CD AS CODE_VALUE FROM M_BIZPLC_T WHERE 1=1 AND FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#fst_bizplc_cd#) ORDER BY SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM

SELECT FNCT_LC_NO AS CODE_VALUE, FNCT_LC_DTLS AS CODE_NAME FROM OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T WHERE FNCT_LC_TY_NM = '가공선로 기능위치' AND FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#fst_bizplc_cd#) AND SCD_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#scd_bizplc_cd#)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, tb.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tower.eqp_no , tower.eqp_nm , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(tower.eqp_nm, tracks.fnct_lc_dtls, ''), '호 철탑', ''), '호 철', '') as tower_idx FROM OP_EQP_HEADER_T tower INNER JOIN OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T tracks ON tower.fnct_lc_no = tracks.fnct_lc_no WHERE tower.eqp_ty_cd='T001' AND tracks.fnct_lc_no= #fnct_lc_no# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM m_nfc_t nfc WHERE tower.eqp_no = nfc.eqp_no) ) ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(tower_idx) ) tb )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOWER.EQP_NM ,replace(replace(TOWER.EQP_NM, trim(TRACK.FNCT_LC_DTLS),''),' 철탑','') as EQP_NM_STRING ,To_Number(replace(replace(TOWER.EQP_NM , trim(TRACK.FNCT_LC_DTLS), ''), '호 철탑','')) as EQP_NM_NUM ,TOWER.LATITUDE ,TOWER.LONGITUDE FROM OP_FUNCTION_HEADER_T TRACK INNER JOIN OP_EQP_HEADER_T TOWER ON TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = TOWER.FNCT_LC_NO AND TOWER.EQP_TY_CD = 'T001' WHERE 1=1
TOWER.FST_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#fst_bizplc_cd#)
TOWER.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = trim(#scd_bizplc_cd#)
TRACK.FNCT_LC_NO = trim(#fnct_lc_no#)
) ORDER BY EQP_NM_NUM
